name: Splash Splosh
description:
A two player local competitive game, about the weird games we make as excuses to jump into the ocean a bunch. 

Made for Bar SK's Summer Game Jam.

 Hit the ball by jumping into it. Get it into the goal on the opposite side to score. First to five wins!

Controls:
A and S: Left player movement

K and L: Right player movement

R: Reset

Escape: Quit
